const HeroSection = () => { const words = `Join us for exciting cricket tournaments in various formats. Whether you're a player or a fan, we've got something for everyone. Discover the passion, skill, and excitement of cricket with CRICKO Organization.`; return (
{/* Darkened overlay for better text visibility */}

{/* Typewriter effect for dynamic text */}
Explore Tournaments About Us
); }; export default HeroSection;
